Question
========
  
The concept of opportunity capitalism has to do with...

Answerlist
----------
* Type I errors.
* The size of the sample
* The number of degrees of freedom
* The homogeneity of variances

Solution
========
  
Probability capitalization implies that the probability of making a Type I error (falsely rejecting H0) increases when doing multiple analyses.
